- The annual report has been added to the report screen
- Added screen capture function at the top left of the report screen
(Press the button to make the entire screen an image. You can print or save the image.)
- Added India Rupee to the currency settings
- Fixed some other bugs

* Support some languages
* Support some currencies
* Added some category icons
* Fixed some bugs

* Support some languages
* Support some currencies
* Added some category icons
* Fixed some bugs

- The report screen has been made easier to see.
- Supported currencies have been added.
- Added a sound when entering numbers.
- The setting screen has been made easier to see.
- Improved some other minor points.

- The report screen has been made easier to see.
- Supported currencies have been added.

- Improved some other minor points.

- The report screen has been made easier to see.
- Supported currencies have been added.
- Added a sound when entering numbers.
- The setting screen has been made easier to see.
- Improved some other minor points.
- Bug fixes on the calendar screen.

- The report screen has been made easier to see.
- Supported currencies have been added.
- Added a sound when entering numbers.
- The setting screen has been made easier to see.
- Improved some other minor points.
- Bug fixes on the calendar screen.

- Added 7 new color theme colors and app icons.
- It is now possible to change the range of the month!
- For example, it is now possible to select whether the range for April is "4/25 - 5/24" or "3/25 - 4/24".
- Changed the PDF data output size to A4 size.
- Fixed at the bottom of the screen so that advertisements do not stand out.
- Fixed the bug that the report screen freezes.
- Fixed a bug that the calculator was reset when editing data.
- Fixed some problems mainly on the report screen.

- Added 7 new color theme colors and app icons.
- It is now possible to change the range of the month!
- For example, it is now possible to select whether the range for April is "25/4 - 24/5" or "25/3 - 24/4".
- Changed the PDF data output size to A4 size.
- Fixed at the bottom of the screen so that advertisements do not stand out.
- Fixed the bug that the report screen freezes.
- Fixed a bug that the calculator was reset when editing data.
- Fixed some problems mainly on the report screen.
---
- Added a new app icon, Monotone Black.
- Fixed the bug that the report screen may freeze sometimes.
- Fixed the problem that the table was enlarged when outputting PDF.
- Fixed the bug where the background music you are listening to may stop.
- Corrected the calculation method for the average amount of the annual category report.

- Added 7 new color theme colors and app icons.
- It is now possible to change the range of the month!
- For example, it is now possible to select whether the range for April is "25/4 - 24/5" or "25/3 - 24/4".
- Changed the PDF data output size to A4 size.
- Fixed at the bottom of the screen so that advertisements do not stand out.
- Fixed the bug that the report screen freezes.
- Fixed a bug that the calculator was reset when editing data.
- Fixed some problems mainly on the report screen.
---
- Added a new app icon, Monotone Black.
- Fixed the bug that the report screen may freeze sometimes.
- Fixed the problem that the table was enlarged when outputting PDF.
- Fixed the bug where the background music you are listening to may stop.
- Corrected the calculation method for the average amount of the annual category report.
Bug fixes that the app displays wrong data on the monthly category report screen.
Bug fixes that the app displays wrong data on the monthly category report screen.

* Fixed costs and incomes can now be edited.
* The category that was selected after data registration is not reset.
* Double tapping the "Input" tab now takes you to the today.
* The decimal point was added to the Ruble and Malaysian dollar (M$).
* Fixed a bug on the annual category report.
* Some other minor inconveniences have been improved.
* Fixed some crash bugs.

--- v2.8.4
When multiple data are entered with the same category selected, the data after the second one is not included in the first one. Fixed an issue where it would be registered in a category (e.g. food cost).

* Fixed costs and incomes can now be edited.
* The category that was selected after data registration is not reset.
* Double tapping the "Input" tab now takes you to the today.
* The decimal point was added to the Ruble and Malaysian dollar (M$).
* Fixed a bug on the annual category report.
* Some other minor inconveniences have been improved.
* Fixed some crash bugs.
--- v2.8.4
When multiple data are entered with the same category selected, the data after the second one is not included in the first one. Fixed an issue where it would be registered in a category (e.g. food cost).

- When outputting data, the date order could be changed.
- When outputting data, you can select the target data.
- Fixed the problem that battery consumption was occurring in the background for some users.
- Fixed some other bugs.
